text: “Choncho (tidawalanga) chifukwa chakuswa mapangano awo, ndi kukana kwawo zisonyezo za Allah, ndi kupha kwawo aneneri popanda choonadi, ndi kunena kwawo kwakuti: “Mitima yathu yakutidwa (siingathe kuzindikira zomwe ukunena iwe Muhammad {s.a.w}).” (Ai, Siinakutidwe ndi chilichonse), koma Allah waidinda zidindo chifukwa cha kusakhulupirira kwawo; tero sakhulupirira koma pang’ono pokha
